title: With His Best Friend:
description: Desiree and Richard have recently moved into a new house. The young couple feel sorry for Richard's best friend Paul, who is going through a breakup with his wife and allow him to stay in their basement suite. Desiree has a deep fantasy she has always wanted to try. With Paul there will she get to act upon it and will Richard let her?  This book is erotica, it is not a Romance. Contains graphic depictions of m/m/f sex.
author: J.D. Anders
